persons: Ali bin al-Hussein, Prince of Jordan
subject: Soccer
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: The electoral committee rejected the candidacy of Musa Bility of Liberia, and the group’s chairman said he would not consider Michel Platini of France.
